name: Brynwood Partners
overview:
Founded in 1984, Brynwood Partners is a private equity firm that makes control investments in lower middle market companies over a long-term horizon. The firm acquires companies in a diverse range of industries with enterprise values between $25 and $125 million.

The Principals of Brynwood Partners believe operating expertise is the most important factor for creating value in lower middle market companies. The Principals bring extensive experience as both company operators and private equity investors to each opportunity. This allows the Principals to work in partnership with management teams to create long term value.

funds.name: Brynwood Partners VI
funds.source_description: Brynwood Partners VI Holds Final Close at $305M
